pageContext.description: Made of very thin metal of a very light weight: it appears to have a high percentage of tin on the surface in many places, where it is unpatinated, has a "tinny" look. Prominent flanges but no stiff ridge. Edge broken. Prominent [...] marks along sides of flanges. In the middle, the flanges curve inwards till they almost meet.
pageContext.surface: No patina in places, showing the metal with "tinny" surface.
pageContext.other: Many comment that don't correspond with given boxes. Some illegible. Sorry., Weight- units unknown, can't read the handwriting on the image,  ,
pageContext.associations: Presumably one from hoard of at least 7 axes, [...]
pageContext.publications: See ,  Ellas Deveres, Arch. Cambr. 1937, 335, Fig.,  [...] No. 339, Fig. [...],  of. [...] 1951, 185 no. 527, fig 68.7,       Domes 1949, 434-6,       Burgess 1980, 264 (BAR 76)
pageContext.collection: M'. Fitz-Aucher, Arnold House,  , Llanddulas, Denbishshi R.
pageContext.site: Sticker reading: "CLWYD (DENBIGSHIRE), BETTWS- YN- RHOS, MOELFRE UCHAF",, Betws-yn- Rhos,, Between Bettws-yn- Rhos and Llanfair, Talhairn Ph., On ordnance Survey, Denisshire VII N.W., Lat. 53" 16, Long 3' 38", on the small piece of land [...] 1009 feet. (Information from Secretary of Fitz Aucher.)
